conbody.p: JavaPM is a cross-platform utility that assists software developers in the localization of Java projects.

JavaPM converts Java .properties files to XLIFF 1.2 format, allowing their localization using most modern translation environments. Once the XLIFF files have been translated, JavaPM inserts the translations into the Java project, creating new .properties files or updating existing ones as necessary.
JavaPM tracks all .properties files in a Java project. It can create full translation kits or incremental ones when necessary.
All programs published by Maxprograms are localized using JavaPM and Swordfish.
